meanings.definition: Resembling a spider in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The small creature had a spiderlike body with eight legs.
meanings.sent2: The toy spider had a spiderlike design with hairy legs.
meanings.sent3: The spiderlike robot scurried across the floor, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: Her long, thin fingers moved in a spiderlike manner as she weaved through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The dark alley was filled with spiderlike shadows, making it eerie.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a spider.
meanings.sent1: The spiderlike web was intricately woven between the branches.
meanings.sent2: The spiderlike movements of the gymnast impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The spiderlike patience of the teacher helped the students learn effectively.
meanings.sent4: Her spiderlike ability to sense danger saved her from the approaching threat.
meanings.sent5: The spiderlike senses of the detective led to the discovery of the hidden clue.
